name: Petulant Critters
description:
If screen appears blank, try clicking. A prompt that says "Click to continue" may be obscured. It is recommended that you play in Fullscreen for this reason.

Grow your own Critter! ! Over 8 possible pets! Plenty of interactions! Please don’t run out of battery.

_ _ _

Credits: Programming - Serp, Shammy, Gentlemon Art - Mercy, Absol, Shammy Music - Spiffy Voice Acting - Mr Fel Additional Design Work - Tymps
